channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WhatsApp launches long-awaited Apple Watch app
item.description: For the first time, WhatsApp users will be able to use their Apple Watch to get call notifications, read full messages, record and send voice messages...

item.title: The GOP Civil War Over Nick Fuentes Has Just Begun
item.description: Tucker Carlson’s friendly interview with white nationalist Nick Fuentes has led to a major reckoning in the Republican party.

item.title: Norway’s wealth fund vote is latest blow to Musk’s $1 trillion pay package
item.description: Elon Musk is pushing for a $1 trillion performance pay package. Another major shareholder has said no.

item.title: Sequoia names Alfred Lin and Pat Grady as new Co-Stewards as Roelof Botha steps down
item.description: Just over three years after taking the reins as the steward of the storied firm, Botha passed the leadership baton to Lin and Grady.

item.title: 10 Best Meal Delivery Services, Tested by an Ex-Restaurant Critic
item.description: Here are the best meal kits in 2025, from Martha Stewart’s meal kit to the best meal delivery on a budget.

item.title: The 16 Best Advent Calendars (2025): We Opened Every Door
item.description: Treat yourself or someone else to days of little gifts, ranging from sweet treats and savory beverages to beauty products and toys. We found a tiny do...

item.title: It's Been a Year Since Trump Was Elected. Democrats Still Don't Get the Internet
item.description: “I can't, for the life of me, figure out why we are still so rigid and moderating everything when we have nothing to lose for the first time,” a Democ...

item.title: Rivian creates another spinoff company called Mind Robotics
item.description: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
item.description: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across...

item.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
item.description: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of ...
